avg_abs_motion.Description: Mean of absolute (w.r.t first volume) volume-to-volume movement - from eddy_movement_rms

avg_rel_motion.Description: Mean of relative (w.r.t previous volume) volume-to-volume movement - from eddy_movement_rms

avg_x_translation.Description: Mean of participant movement - from eddy_parameters

avg_y_translation.Description: Mean of participant movement - from eddy_parameters

avg_z_translation.Description: Mean of participant movement - from eddy_parameters

avg_x_rotation.Description: Mean of participant movement (converted to degrees) - from eddy_parameters

avg_y_rotation.Description: Mean of participant movement (converted to degrees) - from eddy_parameters

avg_z_rotation.Description: mean of participant movement (converted to degrees) - from eddy_parameters

TotalOutliers.Description: Count of outlier slices - from eddy_outlier_report

TotalOutliers_pc.Description: Count of outlier slices as a percentage of total slices (80 non-b0 volumes * 68 slices
